pkgmetadata.longdescription: Handle Air Quality Data from the European Environment Agency Data Portal // This software downloads and manages air quality data from the European Environmental Agency (EEA) dataflow (https://www.eea.europa.eu/data-and-maps/data/aqereporting-9). See the web page https://eeadmz1-downloads- webapp.azurewebsites.net/ for details on the EEA's Air Quality Download Service. The package allows dynamically mapping the stations, summarising and time aggregating the measurements and building spatial interpolation maps. See the web page https://www.eea.europa.eu/en for further information on EEA activities and history. Further details, as well as, an extended vignette of the main functions included in the package, are available at the GitHub web page dedicated to the project.
